narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Alma Marroquin is a Occupational Therapist provider based in Mcallen, TX. From 2024-01 through 2024-08, this provider received $180K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 691 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 2.4× the national median for 97530 (97530), at $81 per claim vs. the median of $33, placing them above the 75th percentile.
98% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 97530 (97530). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
